sentences.sContent: Originally the collarless shirt and trousers were nondescript, of flannel or wool.
sentences.sContent_eng: Originally the collarless shirt and trousers were nondescript, of flannel or wool.
sentences.sCn: 起初无领的衬衫和长裤是没用固定特征的，或者是法兰绒的或者是羊毛的。

sentences.sContent: A slender forty-nine-year-old with salt-and-pepper hair and a fixed expression, he wore a dark suit with a collarless striped shirt.
sentences.sContent_eng: A slender forty-nine-year-old with salt-and-pepper hair and a fixed expression, he wore a dark suit with a collarless striped shirt.
sentences.sCn: 马沙49岁，身材修长，头发斑白，脸上的表情一成不变。 他穿一套深色西装，里面是一件无领子的条纹T恤。

words.tran: 抓住；给…上领子；给…套上颈圈

trans.tranCn: 无领的,无马轭(或颈圈)的
trans.tranOther: a collarless jacket, shirt etc is one that does not have a collar
